item.title: update stackblitz description & add shortlink
item.description: https://node.new - Online/Cloud Code IDE to create, edit, & deploy fullstack apps. Support any popular NodeJs based frontend & backend frameworks. Shortlink to create new project: [https://node.new](https://node.new).

item.title: Added EmailOctopus
item.description: https://emailoctopus.com - Up to 2,500 subscribers and 10,000 emails per month free

item.title: Add GitDailies
item.description: https://gitdailies.com - Daily reports of your team's Commit and Pull Request activity on GitHub. Includes Push visualizer, peer recognition system, custom alert builder. Free tier has unlimited users, 3 repos, 3 alert configs.

item.title: Add Geoapify to Data Visualizations on maps
item.description: https://www.geoapify.com/ - Vector and raster map tiles, geocoding, places, routing, isolines APIs. 3000 free requests / day.

item.title: Added Viezly - code review tool
item.description: https://viezly.com/ - Enhanced code review tool for easier code reading and navigation. Free for Open Source and free for personal usage.

item.title: Update link to point to product page
item.description: https://lean20.com/product/status/ - Public status pages for incident reporting. 100% free.

item.title: Adding Lean20 Status Pages to monitoring tools
item.description: https://lean20.com - Public status pages for incident reporting. 100% free.

item.title: dropped Beta from Eva Beta
item.description: https://eva.pingutil.com - Verify 5 million emails per day for free using REST API. No sign-ups required.

item.title: Added 4 new entries under Email section
item.description:
https://www.antideo.com - 10 API requests per hour for email verification, IP and phone number validation in free tier. No Credit Cards required.
https://eva.pingutil.com - â€” Verify 5 million emails per day for free using REST API. No sign-ups required.
https://quickemailverification.com - Verify 100 emails daily for free on a free tier along with other free APIs like DEA Detector, DNS Lookup, SPF Detector and more.
https://hottempmail.com/ - Unlimited free temp email or disposable temporary email addresses. Autoexpires in one day.
https://temp-mail.org - Temporary, secure, anonymous, free, disposable email address with REST API for fetching 100 emails from its disposable mailbox per day for free.
